meanings.definition: The act of watching television programs.
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the day is when I settle down for some televiewings.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys her televiewings in the evening after work.
meanings.sent3: During our family televiewings, we always argue about what to watch.
meanings.sent4: His televiewings were like a window to different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors on the screen made her televiewings unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The ability to view television broadcasts remotely.
meanings.sent1: With modern technology, televiewings can be done from anywhere in the world.
meanings.sent2: The satellite dish provided clear televiewings even in remote areas.
meanings.sent3: His televiewings from the top of the mountain were interrupted by a curious goat.
meanings.sent4: Her televiewings felt like she was right in the studio with the actors.
meanings.sent5: The virtual reality headset enhanced his televiewings to a whole new level.
